definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Add low flow aerators to all the faucets in your home.
sentences.chinese: 把你家裏的每個水龍頭都裝上加氣儀。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the research process of AAC ( Autoclaved aerated concrete)bricks exclusive interface agent.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了加氣砼砌塊專用界面劑的研製過程。

sentences.english: Cooperate with control system in order to realize that several dispensers fueling through one pump.
sentences.chinese: 可配合站控系統實現一泵多機同量加氣的功能。

sentences.english: Even an air-entraining agent can be used because the minute pores are discontinuous.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可以使用加氣劑，因爲小的氣孔是不連通的。

sentences.english: When carbon dioxide is artificial join, called gas sparkling wines.
sentences.chinese: 當二氧化碳是人工加入時，稱爲加氣起泡葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Office internal partitions use aerated concrete block, with thickness of 200mm in all.
sentences.chinese: 內部間隔牆均採用200厚加氣混凝土砌塊砌築。

sentences.english: Chamber of aerated concrete wall thickness is three to one in five.
sentences.chinese: 氣室壁厚度是加氣混泥土的三至五分之一。

sentences.english: Cutting machine is the core equipment in production of aerated concrete.
sentences.chinese: 切割機是加氣混凝土生產中的核心設備。

sentences.english: This machine is the necessary equipment for hoisting of aerated concrete.
sentences.chinese: 本機是加氣混凝土吊裝時的必備設備。
